Html: For 1.5 would it be possible to create a switch that would allow the program to start minimized in the tray? I would like to run it at startup without having to click on the icon to make it minimize. Thanks!
It may be a while before I get much of a chance to work on 1.5, but I'll put it on the feature list.
I'm working on this today; check back here tomorrow, and 1.5 should be here, complete with this feature.

EDIT

Whoops! I just read the documentation and saw you added the switch ;-)
